alert.note: Alert for City and Borough of Sitka; Western Kupreanof and Kuiu Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued October 12 at 3:59AM AKDT until October 12 at 8:00PM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 8 PM AKDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...City and Borough of Sitka and Western Kupreanof Island and Kuiu Island. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 8 PM AKDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: City and Borough of Sitka; Western Kupreanof and Kuiu Island
